variables.description: The key name of the tag.
variables.name: Key

variables.description: Set to true if you want AWS CloudFormation to copy the tag to EC2 instances that are launched as                   part of the auto scaling group. Set to false if you want the tag attached only to the                   auto scaling group and not copied to any instances launched as part of the auto scaling                   group.
variables.name: PropagateAtLaunch
